extension.description: DSLIVE

Demon FM is a student radio station based at De Montfort University in Leicester, England. The station is simulcast on FM and online on a 24/7 basis and was set up in 1995 by the Communications Officer of the time, Rob Martin.

Demon FM ist ein studentischer Radiosender an der De Montfort University in Leicester, England. Die Station ist simultan auf FM und online rund um die Uhr verfügbar und wurde 1995 von dem damaligen Kommunikationsbeauftragten Rob Martin gegründet.

Demon FM es una estación de radio estudiantil con sede en De Montfort University en Leicester, Inglaterra. La estación se transmite simultáneamente en FM y en línea las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana, y fue creada en 1995 por el Oficial de Comunicaciones de la época, Rob Martin.

Demon FM est une station de radio étudiante basée à l'Université De Montfort à Leicester, en Angleterre. La station est diffusée simultanément en FM et en ligne 24 heures sur 24 et 7 jours sur 7 et a été créée en 1995 par le responsable des communications de l'époque, Rob Martin.

Demon FM è una stazione radio studentesca con sede presso la De Montfort University a Leicester, in Inghilterra. La stazione è trasmessa in simulcast su FM e online 24 ore su 24, 7 giorni su 7, ed è stata creata nel 1995 dall'ufficiale addetto alle comunicazioni dell'epoca, Rob Martin.

extension.description: Leicester Community Radio started in 2015, run by well known faces from the Leicester music scene. Leicester Community Radio a commencé en 2015, géré par des visages bien connus de la scène musicale de Leicester. Jouer un mélange de racines, de reggae, de dub, de r&b, de hip-hop, de ska, de soca ainsi que de house, drum & Basse etc. La station vise à fournir à tous les résidents de Leicester une source centrale pour la meilleure musique autour.

La radio de la comunidad de Leicester comenzó en 2015, funcionada por las caras conocidas de la escena de la música de Leicester. Jugando una mezcla de raíces, reggae, dub, r&b, hip-hop, ska, soca, así como house, drum & Bajo etc. La estación tiene como objetivo proporcionar a todos los residentes de Leicester una fuente central para la mejor música alrededor.

Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.

extension.summary: PyAMF provides Action Message Format (AMF) support for Python that is compatible with the Adobe Flash Player.
extension.description: The Adobe Integrated Runtime and Adobe Flash Player use AMF to communicate between an application and a remote server. AMF encodes remote procedure calls (RPC) into a compact binary representation that can be transferred over HTTP/HTTPS or the RTMP/RTMPS protocol. Objects and data values are serialized into this binary format, which increases performance, allowing applications to load data up to 10 times faster than with text-based formats such as XML or SOAP. AMF3, the default serialization for ActionScript 3.0, provides various advantages over AMF0, which is used for ActionScript 1.0 and 2.0. AMF3 sends data over the network more efficiently than AMF0. AMF3 supports sending int and uint objects as integers and supports data types that are available only in ActionScript 3.0, such as ByteArray, ArrayCollection, ObjectProxy and IExternalizable.

extension.description: RSS (Rich Site Summary; often called Really Simple Syndication) is a type of web feed which allows users to access updates to online content. An RSS document (called "feed") includes full or summarized text, and metadata, like publishing date and author's name.

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction

Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
